    • uri

      default URI uri()

      The LDAP server URI (e.g. ldap://<host>:<port>/...

      Defaults to ldap://localhost:1389.

    • referral

      default LDAPClientConfiguration.ReferralPolicy referral()

      Indicates whether to follow referrals, ignore them or raise exceptions.

      Defaults to LDAPClientConfiguration.ReferralPolicy.FOLLOW.
